##  Bloom Filters (BIP37)

**Node used: node1**

### Step 1: Use bitcoin-cli RPC (legacy)

```bash
bitcoin-cli -regtest -datadir=/home/susan/bitcoin-node1 -rpcport=18457 setnetworkactive false
```

<br>

---

### Step 2: Generate a Bloom Filter

#### i) Install the library

```bash
pip install pybloom-live
```

#### ii) Create a Python file *bloom.py* & run it
```bash
touch bloom.py
python3 bloom.py
```

[**Answer: See bloom.py**](./bloom.py)

*Output*
<br>

![bloom.png](./imgs/bloom.png)

<br>

*Complete Output:*

<br>

```bash
susan@susan-githaiga:~/development/dada-devs/bitcoin-network-SusanGithaigaN$ python3 bloom.py
True
False
Bloom filter bit array: bitarray('')
```
